alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 7:05PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN MASON, LEWIS, SOUTHEASTERN BROWN, SOUTHERN ADAMS AND SOUTHWESTERN SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM EDT... At 705 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Aberdeen to near Tollesboro to near Nepton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Maysville, Manchester, Aberdeen, Vanceburg, Lewisburg, Camp Dix, Tollesboro, Rome, Concord, Trinity, Murphysville, Saint Paul, Bradysville, Mays Lick, Kinniconick, Rectorville, Epworth, Ribolt, Friendship and Peed. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
